text: An Enemy of the People is a 1978 American drama movie directed by George Schaefer and is based on Arthur Miller's 1950 adaptation of Henrik Ibsen's 1882 play of the same name. It stars Steve McQueen, Charles Durning, Bibi Andersson, Eric Christmas, Michael Cristofer and was distributed by Warner Bros.. == Other websites == * * * Category:1978 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George Schaefer Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: An Enemy of the People (movie)
